1497.quoteText: You agree that we and our its licensors may make changes to the services offered on the Site, at any time without notice, and you further agree that we can revise these Terms at any time without notice by posting updated Terms on the Site.
1497.title: jobvite.com can change terms without notifying you

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
tosdr.tldr: jobvite.com can change terms without notifying you
